title: Launcher does not start
body:
Hello!
I click the launcher icon (i tried both admin or normal icon). It shows LOL logo and thennothing happens.

I tried compatibility mode but nothing, on both files. Also administrator rights is not working

Any idea?

replies.body:
FIXED MINE!!!!!! Will Edit with how I did it. Refresh this lol

EDIT: Step 1 :
Go to "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects"
Delete "lol_launcher" folder
Start your client as admin and wait 30s - 1 min while it re-downloads your launcher. 

I hope this fixed it for you like it did for me!


Source: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1lps3z/if_client_is_not_starting_heres_the_fix_enjoy/


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
someone buy this man a teemo skin

Worked instantly, thanks.

Shame it was an hour too late to play with my friend.

Thanks A lot!!!!
Now to re install Avast :D

right click, virus chest, be very careful here and find the one that says it's the rads file for LoLLauncher.exe, right click, restore and add to exclusions
Does everyone here who has the problem have Avast?
maybe
me yeah
Same.  Someone must have spilled coffee on the servers again.  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

IF YOU ARE HAVING TROUBLE AND HAVE AVAST:
disabling/uninstalling avast won't fix the problem guys.

Avast already picked up and removed the file it claims was a problem and that is why the launcher isn't launching. This means that even if you disable avast the file still isn't there.

What you need to do is find the file it removed and restore it and add it to exclusions. Be very careful doing this because you don't want to restore an actual virus:

right click avast on your task bar
go to "virus chest"
be very careful here and find the one that says it's the RADS file for LoLLauncher.exe, It will look like this:
https://i.gyazo.com/d2de089792beaa31239118222d2dff66.png
right click 
restore and add to exclusions

Edit: also there is apparently a "show last popup message" so if this was the last thing avast did then it *should* still be the last popup there and you can just add it to exclusions from there. but this way will let you restore this even if avast has already given you another popup since then.
Do you have avast?
Yes i do. But I added league to the exclusion list, and I tried deactivating avast, still wont launch.
i unistalled avast and tried and still won't help
same here
glad I'm not just inept then
I disabled my avast and it still won't launch.
same

Same problem here. Avast gave an error at first then I added league to the exclusions list and disabled it for added measure. The logo pops up and my processes say that rads user kernel is going, then it disappears.

I'm having the same issue. It just simply will not boot up.

I tried re-installing as well and nothing.

If you're having problems with Avast blocking it, go into your hidden icons in the bottom right corner of your desktop.
Then right-click on the Avast logo
Go into the Virus Chest
Right-Click the LolLauncher and LolPatcher files and select "Restore and add to exclusions"
Close the Virus Chest
Launch League of Legends
Enjoy :)

If you're running any third party programs, I'd make sure to close them.  Otherwise, since you've already tried to adjust permissions, go ahead and [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Be sure to include your [System Logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) which should help us speed along the troubleshooting process!
